name: 2 Robots in a Trench Coat
description:
Premise:

You told everybody that you have a girlfriend/boyfriend, but you don't!

Now they want to meet them at the upcoming party.

The only solution is to stack 2 robots and put them in a trenchcoat.

There's no way this plan could go wrong!

Wait.

Why's everybody staring?

Mission:

Don't get noticed for the duration of the party.

Gameplay:

-avoid making people suspicious

-people get suspicious when you do things you shouldn't

-make sure your date doesn't fall apart

-once people are suspicious they will try to catch your date

-NPCs walk on a cycle unless suspicious

-if caught you lose

-if you greet all guests at the party then you win
